name: Phantom Frenzy
description:
Free to Play Match 3 Game of Ghosts and Spooks

Embark on a journey to a world filled with chaos and frenzy, solve the puzzle by connecting the cute ghosts, just like connecting dots, a fun and simple game that will keep you occupied. Challenge yourself in timed mode or relax yourself in moves mode. Unravel the world of fun, unlimited puzzles, unlock trophies, play with different themes, share it and play it with your friends.

*New Themes.
*Incredible Trophies to Unlock.
*Timed mode.
*Moves mode
